text: Michael Terence Aspel, OBE (born 12 January 1933) is an English television presenter.He is known for his programmes such as Crackerjack, Aspel & Company, This is Your Life, Strange but True? and Antiques Roadshow. He was born in London. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Michael Aspel biography at BFI Screenonline * Interview with Liverpool Daily Post Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:English television presenters Category:English television personalities Category:English television actors Category:English radio personalities Category:Actors from London
title: Michael Aspel
